          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Energy from the Sun creates wind</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie von der Sonne stellt Wind her</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'énergie du soleil crée le vent</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A energia do sol cría o vento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'energia proveniente dal sole crea il vento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ενέργεια από τον ήλιο δημιουργεί τον αέρα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La energía del sol crea el viento</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that wind is formed due to differences in air temperature caused by heating from the Sun.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cold</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hot</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sunlight</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wind</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Wind an den 
Unterschieden bezüglich der Lufttemperatur gebildetes liegt, die 
indem er von der Sonne verursacht wird, erhitzt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que le vent est dû 
formé aux différences dans la température de l'air provoquée par 
la chauffage du soleil.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que o vento é  dado 
forma devido às diferenças na temperatura de ar causada se aquecendo
do sol.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che il vento è 
formato dovuto le differenze nella temperatura dell'aria causata 
riscaldando dal sole.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι ο αέρας διαμορφώνεται 
λόγω στις διαφορές στη θερμοκρασία αέρα που προκαλείται με τη 
θέρμανση από τον ήλιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que el viento es formado
debido a las diferencias en temperatura del aire causada calentando 
del sol.</string>
          </description>
